column1: 00:58|It was downright shameless on his part to come visiting them
column3: almost at one in the morning
column4: after all that had happened.|The Idiot|Fyodor Dostoyevsky

column1:
00:58|"00:58 CET
""Everything's in place. Now all we have to do is. . .""
William didn't move a muscle until the voice faded away. More words
column2: but they were scattered in the wind. He raised the tarpaulin an inch
column3: and his eyes settled on a group of four men standing only a few yards from the lifeboat."|Nothing Ventured|Jeffrey Archer
